tuv.seg: Making a complaint about a Financial Service Provider
Gearán a dhéanamh faoi soláthróirí seirbhíse airgeadais
A financial service provider in Ireland is a firm that deals with saving money, insurance, banking, stockbroking or other financial service
Is cuideachta í soláthraí seirbhíse airgeadais in Éirinn a phléann le coigilt airgid, le hárachas, le baincéireacht, le stocbhróicéireacht nó le seirbhís airgeadais éigin eile
If you have a complaint about a financial service provider you should begin by complaining directly to the person that you would normally deal with in the firm
Má tá gearán agat faoi sholáthraí seirbhíse airgeadais, ba cheart duit tosú le gearán a thabhairt go díreach chuig an té ar gnách leat plé leo sa chuideachta féin
If you are not satisfied with how your complaint is dealt with you can make a more formal complaint to senior management at the financial service provider
Mura bhfuil tú sásta leis an gcaoi a gcaitear le do ghearán, féadfaidh tú gearán níos foirmiúla a thabhairt chuig lucht bainistíochta sinsearach an tsoláthraí seirbhíse airgeadais
The Competition and Consumer Protection Commission provides information on how to complain about financial service providers
Cuir an Ghníomhaireacht Náisiúnta Tomhaltóirí eolas ar fáil ar conas gearán a thabhairt faoi sholáthraithe seirbhíse airgeadais
You can read more about effective ways to make a complaint here
Is féidir leat tuilleadh a léamh faoi bhealaí éifeachtacha le gearán a dhéanamh anseo
If you are still not satisfied that your complaint is being dealt with fairly by the firm, you may take your complaint to the Financial Services Ombudsman
Mura bhfuil tú sásta fós go bhfuil an chuideachta ag plé go cothrom le do ghearán, féadfaidh tú do ghearán a thabhairt chuig Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais
The Financial Services Ombudsman Bureau was established under the Central Bank and Financial Services Authority Ireland Act 2004
Bunaíodh Biúró Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais faoin Acht um Údarás an Bhainc Cheannais agus na Seirbhísí Airgeadais 2004
The Bureau commenced it's work on 1 April 2005
Chuaigh an Biúró i mbun oibre den chéad uair ar 1 Aibreán 2005
The Financial Services Ombudsman is an independent officer whose remit is to investigate, mediate and adjudicate unresolved complaints of customers about financial service providers

Is oifigeach neamhspleách é Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais arb é a shainchúram ná chun gearáin neamhréitithe na dtomhaltóirí i leith soláthraithe airgeadais a fhiosrú, a idirghabháil agus a bhreithniú
The Ombudsman for the Credit Institutions and the Insurance Ombudsman of Ireland schemes are now part of the Financial Services Ombudsman Bureau
Tá scéimeanna an Ombudsman do na hInstitiúidí Creidmheasa agus Ombudsman Árachais na hÉireann mar chuid de Bhiúró Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais anois
Any complaints that were made to either of these offices before the Bureau was established will be carried forward
Tabharfar ar aghaidh aon ghearán a rinneadh do cheachtar den dá oifig sin sular bunaíodh an Biúró
The Office of the Pensions Ombudsman will continue to deal with any complaints about occupational pension schemes or Personal Retirement Savings Accounts (PRSAs)
Leanfaidh Oifig Ombudsman na bPinsean ag plé le haon ghearáin faoi scéimeanna pinsin ghairmiúla nó Cuntais Choigiltis Phearsanta Scoir (PRSA)
You should submit a complaint you may have about the way that a scheme is being administered to the Pension Ombudsman
Ba chóir duit gearán a chur isteach a fhéadann a bheith agat faoin gcaoi a bhfuiltear ag riaradh scéim éigin don Ombudsman Pinsin
You can read more about Ireland's Pensions Ombudsman here
Is féidir leat tuilleadh a léamh faoi Ombudsman Pinsean na hÉireann anseo
Who can complain to the Financial Services Ombudsman’s Bureau?
Cé hiad na dreamanna ar féidir leo gearán a thabhairt chuig Biúró Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadaisω
All personal customers of regulated financial institutions can make complaints to the Financial Services Ombudsman’s Bureau
Is féidir le gach custaiméir pearsanta de chuid na n-institiúidí airgeadais rialaithe gearáin a thabhairt chuig Biúró Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais
People who have been offered services or have sought the provision of service from the financial institution can also make complaints to the Bureau
Is féidir leis na daoine ar tairgeadh seirbhísí dóibh nó a lorg soláthar seirbhíse ón institiúid airgeadais gearáin a thabhairt chuig an mBiúró freisin
The Financial Services Ombudsman’s Bureau will also receive complaints from small businesses (i.e
Glacfaidh Biúró Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais le gearáin ó ghnólachtaí beaga freisin (.i
companies with an annual turnover of less than 3,000,000 euro)
comhlachtaí le láimhdeachas bliantúil níos lú ná 3,000,000 euro)
What companies can the Financial Services Ombudsman’s Bureau investigate?
Cé hiad na comhlachtaí ar féidir le Biúró Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais a fhiosrúω

The Bureau will investigate complaints against Banks, Building Societies, Credit Unions, Stockbrokers, Insurance Companies (life and non-life), Bureaux de Change, Investment Product Intermediaries, Moneylenders and Designated Investment Companies, Credit Intermediaries (for example, garages that offer finance on new or used cars), Pawnbrokers and Hire Purchase Companies

Fiosróidh an Biúró gearáin i gcoinne na mBanc, na gCumann Foirgníochta, na gComhar Creidmheasa, Stocbhróicéirí, Comhlachtaí Árachais (beatha agus neamhbheatha), Bureaux de Change, Idirghabhálaithe Táirge Infheistíochta, Iasachtóirí Airgid agus Comhlachtaí Infheistíochta ainmnithe, Idirghabhálaithe Creidmheasa (mar shampla, garáistí a thairgeann airgeadas ar charranna úra nó úsáidte), Geallbhróicéirí agus Comhlachtaí Fruilcheannaigh
Certain Mortgage Lenders and the VHI may also be investigated by the Bureau if there is a complaint made against them
Is féidir leis an mBiúró Iasachtóirí Morgáiste áirithe agus an VHI a fhiosrú freisin má dhéantar gearán ina gcoinne
Since 7 February 2013, it cannot pursue complaints against the Irish Bank Resolution Corporation (IBRC) without the consent of the High Court
Ó 7 Feabhra 2013, ní féidir leis gearáin a shaothrú i gcoinne Chorparáid na hÉireann um Réiteach Bainc (IBRC) gan toiliú na hArd-Chúirte
Time limits for making a complaint to the Financial Services Ombudsman
Teorainneacha ama chun ghearán a thabhairt do Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais
A six year limit applies to all cases so the Ombudsman will not investigate any case arising from events that happened over six years ago
Feidhmíonn teorainn shé bliana do gach cás, ionas nach bhfiosróidh an tOmbudsman aon chás a eascraíonn as eachtraí a tharla ní ba mhó ná sé bliana ó shin
The Financial Services Ombudsman Council
Comhairle Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais
The Ombudsman works under Regulations made by the Financial Services Ombudsman Council with the prior approval of the Minister for Finance
Oibríonn an tOmbudsman faoi Rialacháin a rinne Comhairle Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais le ceadú roimhré an Aire Airgeadais
The Council appoints the Ombudsman and consists of members of the financial services industry and consumer representatives
Ceapann an Chomhairle an tOmbudsman agus is inti atá baill de thionscal na seirbhísí airgeadais agus ionadaithe tomhaltóirí
The Council also prescribes limits on the amount of awards that can be granted
Is í an Chomhairle a fhorordaíonn teorainneacha um méid na dámhachtainí ar féidir a bhronnadh
The Ombudsman can make awards up to certain limits (250,000 euro)
Is féidir leis an Ombudsman dámhachtainí a dhéanamh suas go dtí teorainneacha áirithe (250,000 euro)
Awards are binding on both parties
Bíonn na dámhachtainí ceangailteach ar an dá pháirtí
These awards can however, be appealed to the High Court by either the financial institution or the consumer who took the complaint
. Is féidir leis an institiúid airgeadais nó an tomhaltóir a rinne an gearán achomharc a thabhairt chuig an Ard-Chúirt in aghaidh na ndámhachtainí seo
Services from the Financial Services Ombudsman Bureau are free
Tá na seirbhísí ó Bhiúró Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais saor in aisce
If you lose your case, you won't have to pay any charges to the Bureau or to the financial services provider against which you took your claim
Má chailleann tú do chás, ní bheidh ort aon mhuirir a íoc leis an mBiúró ná le soláthraí na seirbhísí airgeadais ar thug tú d'éileamh ina choinne
You may engage a solicitor or any other professional to help you with your application to the Bureau
Féadfaidh tú aturnae nó gairmí éigin eile a fhostú chun cuidiú leat le d'iarratas chuig an mBiúró
Costs associated with hiring a professional under these circumstances are your own responsibility
Is é do chúram féin iad na costais a bhaineann le gairmí a fhostú faoi na cúinsí seo
If you have a complaint about a financial service provider you are advised to take the following steps:
Má bhíonn gearán agat faoi sholáthraí seirbhíse airgeadais, moltar duit na céimeanna seo a leanas a ghlacadh:
• Make a complaint first of all to the person who you normally deal with at the bank, building society, insurance company or other financial service provider
• Déan do ghearán sa chéad dul síos chuig an té a bpléann tú go hiondúil leo ag an mbanc, an cumann foirgníochta, an comhlacht árachais nó soláthraí seirbhíse airgeadais
• If you are not satisfied with the response from the financial service provider, you should put your complaint in writing, addressing the letter to their senior management
• Mura bhfuil tú sásta leis an bhfreagra ón soláthraí seirbhíse airgeadais, ba cheart duit do ghearán a chur i bhfoirm scríbhinne, leis an litir seolta chuig an lucht bainistíochta sinsearach
(Contact details should be available from the bank or by looking at their website)
(Ba chóir go mbeadh sonraí teagmhála ar fáil ón mbanc nó trí fhéachaint ar a suíomh gréasáin).
• If you are still unsatisfied, you may take your complaint to the Financial Services Ombudsman’s Bureau
• Má tá tú míshásta go fóill, féadfaidh tú do ghearán a thabhairt chuig Biúró Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais
The Financial Services Ombudsman has developed a guide for complainants here
Tá Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais tar éis treoir a fhorbairt do ghearánaithe anseo
You may download an application form to commence proceedings with the Bureau here
Féadfaidh tú foirm iarratais a íoslódáil chun imeachtaí a thionscnamh leis an mBiúró anseo
Remember, the Financial Services Ombudsman will only take on a case after the formal complaints mechanism of the financial institution has been exhausted
Cuimhnigh nach nglacfaidh Ombudsman na Seirbhísí Airgeadais le cás ach amháin tar éis d'ídiú mheicníocht na ngearán foirmiúil de chuid na hinstitiúide airgeadais
